title: [Large-Scale] Collaborative Real-Time Instructional Design Workshop

context.prior_knowledge: Experience in science education design and digital tool proficiency
context.additional_context: Course where current science education practitioners learn to optimize instructional design using collaboration tools.

learning_goals: Learners can complete three or more real-time instructional design scenarios using digital collaboration tools
Learners can collaborate with peer designers to identify at least two structural flaws in science education materials
Learners can improve instructional design workflows in analog-digital hybrid environments by at least 15%
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
